quest.name: Qhoterl's Chronicles
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol would set history right once and for all.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine slabs of splendid black rock at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the slabs of splendid black rock to Qhoterl PasolGather tufts of splendid hemp at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the tufts of splendid hemp to Qhoterl PasolSpearfish a splendid mammoth shellfish in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'taDeliver the splendid mammoth shellfish to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Thanks to your tireless efforts, our excavation is nearing its completion. The gifts of the past we've uncovered here will be a boon to future Qitari, to be sure, but we mustn't keep our discoveries to ourselves. No, I intend to spread knowledge of Ronka to every corner of the world!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To that end, I mean to author a definitive history of Ronka with my own hands. Moreover, I intend to use an ingenious system of woodblocks and ink to produce enough copies so that no curious mind goes unsated.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray bring me a slab of black stone from Mjrl's Regret. While it may appear a common stone at first glance, we have long used it to make writing instruments.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray bring me hemp from Mjrl's Regret. I can't start writing without paper, and the material made from this hemp is as sturdy as it comes.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you would be an ally of history, then I have just the task for you. Pray return with a mammoth shellfish from the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. Though they may be tricky to snag with your spear, their sacs contain enough ink to fill countless inkwells.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the black stone and I shall begin writing at once!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the hemp and I shall begin writing at once!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The world is eager to learn the truth of Ronka. Return here with the shellfish and I shall begin writing at once!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I am always glad to see you, and now more than ever! Have you brought the materials I requested?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Splendid, as always! I eventually hope to distribute my chronicle throughout Norvrandt, although it would be prudent to begin with a smaller proving ground, such as the Greatwood. Assuming I meet with success here, my ambitions know no bounds!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: A Steward can ask for no greater honor than this task I've given myself, and I shan't rest until I see it done!
